Package io.github.iherongh.wikicraft.config

Class WCConfigUtils

java.lang.Object
io.github.iherongh.wikicraft.config.WCConfigUtils
public class WCConfigUtils extends Object
A class containing utility methods for the config.yml file.
Since:
0.1.0
